website_summaries.verdict: This decorative gas fireplace is made from weather-resistant steel for long-lasting use.
pros: Features a 30,000 BTU stainless steel burner
Decorative base conceals a propane tank
cons: Some have said assembly is difficult

customer_reviews.title: So much for such a reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.text: Read everyone's reviews and tips so assembly and initial ignition were easy. Tip to depress the ignition button for 30 or so seconds before igniting was especially helpful and did not cause panic! Added fire glass and just love the look and ambiance without the fuss!! So many compliments already as we sit out by the pool and pond. And now looking forward to s'mores with the little ones! Will be putting on wheels as one reviewer did to help move it wherever the party is in our backyard! Just love it after putting it together the afternoon it arrived and then sitting out each evening with a glass of wine! ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Steph S.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Wow this product shipped quickly and arrived within days. Assembly was challenging however well worth the effort. Have to purchase propane tank separately from Home Depot but knew that when purchased. Very much as pictured. Exceptional quality and value. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice V.

customer_reviews.title: Great fire feature!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire table! I would estimate running time to be 15-20 hours on a standard grill-size propane tank. Assembly was easy - took 45 minutes and I did it by myself. Pay attention to where the door goes in relation to the gas controls or you'll have to take it apart and start over. And if you're getting fire glass, get 20#, ten isn't enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hella

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our deck.
customer_reviews.text: This went together very easily it just took a little time. I used the star fire glass in Caribbean Blue that I bought on this site. The starter works very easily and the unit is sturdy and works beautifully !! We love it !! Would highly recommend this reasonable quality unit!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! We get loads of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! We get loads of compliments! It was a bit challenging to assemble in that there are many little screws and we couldn't use an electric drill because of the angles. Took about an hour to assemble... but you only have to do that once and then you get to enjoy it! The top is nice looking thick tile. The size of the flame is easily controlled and really puts out some warmth. For that it's not ideal to place cold drinks on the table portion. Perfect height as a centerpiece to our outdoor sofa set. It looks more expensive than it was which is always a nice plus! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Triton

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, but the finish on the top of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the fireplace and put the included cover on it. The first time I took the cover off, a week later, the finish was peeling off the top of the unit, sticking to the cover. It looks awful. It works fine, but the finish on the top of the fireplace is terrible. Buy one that's made of better materials.
customer_reviews.author: D-Rokkit

customer_reviews.title: Defective- will not stay lit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fire pit early this summer. It worked great when I briefly used it right after assembling, but then i did not use it much because we had extremely warm weather. Now that I have tried using it again, I have realized the product is defective. It won’t stay lit more than 60 seconds at a time. I have tried holding in the knob prior to lighting but it still doesn’t work. I can hear the gas going through the pipe, but then the gas kicks off on its own and the flame goes out. I think the regulator is defective. I don’t know how to contact the company to see about a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, just as pictured - pay attention to assembly
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old daughter put it together and noticed something missing from the assembly instructions. When placing the legs on the table, pay close attention to the two legs the door attaches to- the instructions don’t mention them and she put them in the wrong spot the first time. Easy fix, just aggravating. Other than that... delivered in perfect condition. Easy to assemble. Heavy/sturdy construction. Looks great. Works great! Looks exactly as pictured and is a good size. I am now enjoying my evening glass (bottle) of wine by my beautiful fire table.
customer_reviews.author: pagemark

customer_reviews.title: Do not use the cover
customer_reviews.text: The fire table itself is nice but do not use the cover they send with it. It melted to the top of the table from the sun and peeled some of the table off when we pulled it off. We went to Target and bought a nice cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I love this outdoor gas fire pit
customer_reviews.text: I love this outdoor gas fire pit. It does not provide much heat, but for hot summer days it is perfect. Everyone is drawn to it. We have already enjoyed many summer nights using this fire pit. It is beautiful. I replaced the rocks with white glass beads for my own personal touch. I purchased this for about $200. Awesome for the price I hope it holds up. We are taking very good care of it so it lasts. We did not have any problems with installing this product. Being able to flip a switch and have an instant evening ambiance is sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G. Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Love it for some evening patio time
customer_reviews.text: We've used ours a number of times and love it. It's not a source of heat as it doesn't really put out that many BTUs. Picked up some other glass colors for it and my wife loves it. Pros: - Looks really nice and well made - Not too big so nice to gather chairs around Cons: - Igniter doesn't work very well, just use a long lighter to do it NOTE: One trick on lighting is that you need to make sure you turn the dial just to the start spot and hold the dial in
customer_reviews.author: J. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty to look at
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty to look at. Too bad it's been assembled for a few weeks now and only worked twice. We called customer service, walked through all the steps, only to determine we have a defective thermal coupling. Don't they check these things out BEFORE shipping? And that's not the worst, couplings on back order and they will be available. So I have something I was excited to receive, something we assembled, and something that want to sit in the backyard, unworkable. 😐😤😡
customer_reviews.author: Paul Stanford

customer_reviews.title: hypnotic and fun
customer_reviews.text: It's rare that something I purchase exceeds my expectations. When delivered, the table feels a little flimsy and is kind of a pain to put together, but once assembled it performs wonderfully as an outdoor center piece. It can deliver a fair amount of heat, which will be useful come fall, but if you wait until after dark and fill it with some fire glass the effect is nothing short of hypnotic. Use it as a table to hold your wine glasses at your next dinner party and I guarantee you will get some appreciative compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Ivko Cvejic

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  I added wheels/casters to make it mobile.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. Great value for a nice looking firepit. I occasionally have difficulty with the piezo click igniter and have to use a my own lighter... a little annoying but not a huge deal. I replaced the screw-in feet with screw-in caster wheels to make it easier to move around our patio. FYI: the four corners have female M8x1.25 threaded sockets, so require casters with a male M8x1.25 threaded post. These work well:  Ted Lele Caster Wheel, 5Pcs M8 Thread Screw Stem 1.5" Wheel Plastic Stem Brake Swivel Caster 360 Degree Rotation (1.5 inch)
customer_reviews.author: B. Kiersz

customer_reviews.title: Unit Does Not Stay Lit
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews, this is, most definitely, an issue with many of these units. Though strictly following ignition directions, the firepit will make an audible "click" and shut down the gas flow randomly. We thought this might be a safety feature, gone wrong, As mentioned by others, the only way to maintain the flame is by sitting with one hand pressing the knob in... thus, killing the fun for whomever is chosen "fire keeper".
customer_reviews.author: David Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Just got it today and does not work already!!!! do not buy
customer_reviews.text: So pissed off. I just assembled this, got propane and this thing will not stay lit!!!!!! I cannot contact the seller so I am going to have to replace this piece of garbage. I will slap a stamp on it and send it back. Like hell I am disassembling this
customer_reviews.author: kyle Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This does not look anything like what is pictured at all. Did not come with a hard cover, so that you can also use it as a table, like all other ones I looked at. You can find these much better and cheaper! Instructions were totally useless. Good think my husband is smart enough to figure everything out. My fault, didn't do enough looking around for one. I figured as it was more expensive as some that i looked at, it would be better quality. Boy was i wrong!!! I do not recommend this at all!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Girl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase - splurge on fire glass for it
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic fire pit. I highly recommend getting some fire glass instead of the rocks it comes with. Its about $30 for a 10lbs bucket of them (which perfectly fills this item) and it looks far nicer than the basic rocks. You are already getting an amazing deal on the cost of this unit, you may as well splurge on the nicer rocks. It is the perfect small table size and height and works well with most rattan furniture sets. So happy I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.C

customer_reviews.title: Great, clean fire pit
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a rusted out wood burning fire pit with this. Not sure why we didn’t go with propane sooner. The reviews are true - it does take a bminute to get it started, but once it’s going, it’s great. We used the lava rocks that came with it. You’ll probably need to order some more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit arrived on time and in perfect condition. Assembly was not too difficult. An extra hand is useful but not necessary. Instructions could be slightly more clear with orientation of a couple of things. Let your common sense rule. Included lava rock is minimal but ok. We switched to glass chips with no issues. It can be touchy when using the igniter to light it. I just use a regular stick lighter and have no problem. It's lots of bang for your buck. This unit looks very nice. I mean REAL nice. It's not too heavy to move around, and a perfect size for an average deck/patio. We are thoroughly enjoying this thing.
customer_reviews.author: foradrive

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of the big box stores.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looks it’s comparable to what I’ve seen in the big box stores just half the price. Function is easy enough so far. It did take a little bit for me to get it lit but once it’s going it works well. Assembly took let time than I figured, spent maybe 15-20 mins assembling with a Phillips screwdriver and a bit driver. I’ve attached photos for comparison of the fire glass. Glad I went with 20lbs as other suggested. Attached photos with it empty, 10lbs of glass, and 20. Bought the regular 20lb cylinder from Lowe’s and it fits perfect below.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Michael Perry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!! So beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fire pit!! I love it! Assembly was pretty easy, but the only downside is it's small spaces putting in the screws so smaller hands is best! It lit perfect! The stock picture shows the lava rocks over the center ring, we didn't do that only because we wanted to be sure it lit ok. We had this issue with our first fire pit (not this one though). If you use the glass rocks, they can pop and throw out shards of glass but they look so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

customer_reviews.title: No medal cover for rocks
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 these endless summer fire pits and they are sturdy and well built. This one does not have the metal cover for the rocks that turns this into a table. But look for another one because some models do.
customer_reviews.author: Just gotta know?

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and pushed out quite a bit of heat
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get this product because of the reviews saying putting it together was challenging but I was relieved when I found the instructions were actually pretty simple to follow. It takes some time and attention to detail but I put it together by myself in about 45 minutes. They recommend putting all the screws in first before tightening them down to keep everything solid. I covered everything except the igniter with lava rocks and blue fire glass. It's beautiful and great for group gatherings. We love this firepit
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This item only lasted a littler over 1 year. After 1 year, the paint started to wear off. We utilized the cover that it came with it but the cover is so thin that it became very frail and tore in different areas.
customer_reviews.author: Ramonita Leon

customer_reviews.title: Cant get it to fire up!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get it to work! . Bought a brand new tank, filled up the tank with Propane. turn in the ignitor several times, nothing happens except for a very brief spark. so I returned it for a replacement. disassembled the first one, repacked it, and shipped it back. a week later, the new one comes, i assembled it and guess what, same thing happens! before you say its the tank, I borrowed my neighbors tank that he uses for the grille, and it still won't light up. I am done with this. Its going back. Its a shame because the unit does look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harder to Light Than it Should Be
customer_reviews.text: When I first put this together, it lit right up on the first try. I wondered if people who had a hard time lighting it were not reading the instructions or something. Since that first lighting, I have not been able to get it to light using the built in igniter. Just won't light. Not a huge issue as I now keep a log lighter inside the storage area where the propane tank sits. Once lit, it is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christer Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Must light it with a lighter - otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble by one person. Looks great with our dark wicker patio chairs. Would give it 5 stars except it does not light without using a butane lighter. But that’s a first world problem. We just keep a dedicated lighter outside and it fires up and burns fantastic. We added an extra bag of lava rock so it give off lots more heat. Many happy nights out on our desert patio.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Vogt

customer_reviews.title: After a year, still works good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost exactly a year ago. For the price, it has held up pretty good. It will still self light (most of the time) (you have to hold the knob in and let the gas come out for a little while). The cons: the cover did not last. From the AZ heat, it tore and crumbled. A few screws did loosen, but went back in easily. I would recommend this fire table.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Gas
customer_reviews.text: Apparently mine has had a gas leak since we bought it. It seems to be leaking between the starter and the burner. So only when it's on. Spilling out underneath the table. It's always been really smelly. I'm pretty sure I remember calling them when we got it, and being told that you would smell the propane, but after having a friend look into it we were assured there was a leak. I'm not quite sure how to get it fixed from here.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Coster

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, directions were clear
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, directions were clear. I still have a little problem lighting it but am getting the hang of it. It is really nice to sit around, very relaxing. Amazing how cool the top around the rocks stays cool. No problem in setting a drink on the ledge. I just needs a smores kit for the grandkids. It did not come with a plate to cover the rocks when not lit. I plan on getting a 20x20 floor tile to use as a cover and make use of it as a table. I also want to get wheels for it. Another poster suggested 50 mm covered casters with a brake and M8-1.25, 12 mm length.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pulis

customer_reviews.title: Ignitor
customer_reviews.text: Lighting this can be tricky. One minute it works and then next it doesn't. I use a lighter. Not happy with the connector to the propane. Sometimes you can smell the propane. I will have to replace that.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N.

customer_reviews.title: Really loved it used it a couple times
customer_reviews.text: Bought fireplace in April. Really loved it used it a couple times. Now it's July and we want to use it on a cool summer night. It will not light. Cannot figure out what is wrong with it and not sure how to contact anyone to trouble shoot. Does not seem fair to have a product for 4 months and it fails and there is no way to return or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a very nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit looks really nice, especially with the blue glass we purchased additionally. It blends in nicely with our brown wicker patio furniture. It was helpful to have 2 people for assembly but it was not overly difficult. It works great and we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: sandi dorst

customer_reviews.title: The cover looks great but???
customer_reviews.text: This product was pretty simple to assemble, came with a cover (not effective at all really), and works pretty good. Didn't come with enough lava rock but that was a relatively cheap fix. Amazon was very helpful in replacing the cover with a different better quality one:) Very happy with the customer service! There is very little of that left in most marketplaces these days. This product does not give off much heat but enough to enjoy sitting in front of.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Ostrokol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my backyard oasis!
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a fire pit but did not want to have one that burned wood or coal - I would be too nervous to go inside or go to bed if there were embers. This particular fire pit is gas burning and runs on a propane tank which tucks inside the table. It's exactly what I was looking for. I did substitute the lava rock it came with with blue fire glass for a more colorful and sparkly look.
customer_reviews.author: J9

customer_reviews.title: doesn't stay lit
customer_reviews.text: i cannot keep the fire going. It goes out after about 5-10 minutes. I am not sure whty. I follow the directions, and have searched on the internet for a solution, but no luck. Other than that, it was easy to put together and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Accounting C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy It
customer_reviews.text: Made the horrible mistake of dragging this up to our cottage in Ontario (yes, paid the customs tax), and set it up on the deck. It lit 3 times and then stopped....with igniter or lighter. Tried everything and finally dragged it the gas company 35 miles away. $200 later they said it was the igniter so back onto the deck. Lit twice and quit. Now no gas getting to igniter. $400 later its best use will be as an anchor. Shame on them and shame on me!
customer_reviews.author: J. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Mantle Damage!
customer_reviews.text: The purchase of this fire table included an "all-weather" cover. The table was always covered on our deck, exposed to summer northeast sun. The sun exposure "baked" the cover to the mantle top, causing the paint to be lifted w/ the cover. The cover was also ripped in the process and not usable. Not we are the proud owners of a not very attractive fire table!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fire pit- wished it worked!
customer_reviews.text: This was not hard to put together. Hopefully it won't be hard to take apart. We would have given it 5 stars if it worked. The thermocouple is faulty and they don't have a replacement, so now back to the seller it goes. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Covert

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIRE PIT!  Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this fire pit! No more smokey nights for us! It took my husband and 13y/o son all but 15 minutes to put this together. It looks great and lighted immediately! We had no issues as I have seen mentioned in other reviews! Within 20 minutes from putting it together we were roasting marshmallows and were nice and toasty warm on the chilly day we put it together! We are avid BBQ-ers so we always have an extra filled propane tank on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Wren113

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I luv this product. It is perfect for what I needed on our patio and gives off a little heat! Easy to assemble and easy to turn on!!! Super happy so far!! We even had smores with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this fire table!
customer_reviews.text: This fire table is the perfect size and height for our outdoor alcove. Many reviews are saying it won't light or stay lit. I have had no trouble with this. The directions do say to hold the ignitor for 30 seconds. Make sure to do this and there will be no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: Several Flame and Lighting Issues you'll have to overcome!
customer_reviews.text: The igniter does not work after the 1st couple uses. Additionally...after 3 uses, the burner will not stay lit on it's own. I hold the button in for 20 seconds after lighting before releasing and the flame will not stay lit. Have tried the troubleshooting instructions as well and that does not fix it either. Great looking pit but you'll need your own lighter and most likely will need something to hold the button down to keep it lit (this will remove the ability to raise and lower the flame level though).
customer_reviews.author: Preston S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: First, I thought that I bought a different color (tan, brown, clay color) than what arrived (black/charcoal) not a huge deal but now it doesn’t match with our patio stuff. Second, while putting it together, I got to the door part and there are no brackets for the door hinge to hang on. None of the legs have a bracket. I emailed the seller, waiting to hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Ctater

customer_reviews.title: I love our new Endless Summer Gas Outdoor fireplace table
customer_reviews.text: I love our new Endless Summer Gas Outdoor fireplace table. We live at a rather high altitude and the nights are very cool. It puts out a lot of heat. It is so nice to sit outside around the fire to cook some hot dogs and marshmallows without the smoke and mess of a wood fire. It is the perfect fit for our small back yard. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Janice F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for an outdoor patio
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I received this as a wedding gift and we could not LOVE it more. No dealing with a lighter to turn it on, just push & turn the thing and its on! We also like that its not glass pieces and it has a nice ledge for drinks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Igniter trouble
customer_reviews.text: This product was fairly easy to assemble, however the igniter does not work and the only option was to take the entire table apart and send back because the could not just replace a part for the igniter. We opted to just keep the table and light with a grill lighter once it’s lit it really is very nice. The only other thing to note is that is does not have a cover to just cover the burner. It comes with a plastic cover for the entire table which is tricky when the table is hot.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Z.

product_meta.title: Endless Summer GAD1401M LP Gas Table Outdoor Fire Pit with Tile Mantel and Lava Rock, Fireplace, Brown
product_meta.description: Color:BrownWith its tile & steel mantel, this handcrafted Endless Summer LP gas fire pit features the classic elements of high end furniture, with the durability of weather resistant steel. Its decorative base cleverly conceals a propane tank (not included) & control panel, making it an attractive centerpiece for your outdoor living space. Complete with a 30,000 BTU stainless steel burner, you can enjoy all the ambiance of a classic fire without having to tend ashes. Adding to the elegance, this unit includes lava rock, which beautifully accents its flames. The unit is easy to assemble with no tools needed, & includes a 1-year limited warranty & protective cover.
feature_bullets: 30,000 BTU stainless steel burner with electronic ignition
Dimensions: 30 in x 30 in x 24 in
Stylish wicker design, oil rubbed bronze finish
Easy-open door to access tank and control panel
Lava rocks and protective cover included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars461 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
